body:
The pack was based off of Danteh's green New Year's pack, but I decided to redo almost everything. The only things that stayed were the hearts and food bar, gapple, the buckets/lava/water and the fishing rod. The rest is either edited, taken from another pack or completely custom.

NOTE: Audio is very, very low. I'll be fixing that soon.


Major credits:

ZegitaHD's pack (most of the blocks).

Danteh's Green New Years pack (some textures edited and taken from).

Me (ha)

Video:

https://youtu.be/HeUx7tN0DGI

Link to pack:

http://www.mediafire.com/download/62q67x3ygbddw5l/Vayraks+Green+Pack.zip

This pack has been worked on for months. I have fixed every single detail. The color coordination is incredible, to the point where I make the diamond ore green. Anyways, thanks for watching, hope you like the pack c=.
